revised_title: Gold(I) Clustering at the Triphenylphosphinimine Nitrogen Atom: Advances in Coordination Chemistry
tldr: This article discusses the formation of gold(I) clusters at the triphenylphosphinimine nitrogen atom, leading to the discovery of novel complex cations. The research focuses on the coordination chemistry of phosphinimines with gold, revealing significant metal-metal interactions and providing insights into the stability of polyaurated species.
